Package simu.model

Class MyEngine

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
simu.framework.Engine
simu.model.MyEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, IEngine
public class MyEngine extends Engine
Main simulation engine for the cafeteria simulation. Extends the base Engine class and implements the specific event handling logic for customer arrivals, meal preparation, payment processing, and coffee service.

  • Constructor Details

    • MyEngine

      public MyEngine(controller.IControllerMtoV controller, double grillTime, double veganTime, double normalTime, double cashierTime, double selfServiceTime, double coffeeTime, boolean variabilityEnabled, boolean selfServiceEnabled, boolean coffeeEnabled, double arrivalRate, int maxQueueCapacity)
      Constructs a new MyEngine instance with the specified simulation parameters.
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller interface for model-to-view communication
      grillTime - Mean service time for grill station (seconds)
      veganTime - Mean service time for vegan station (seconds)
      normalTime - Mean service time for normal station (seconds)
      cashierTime - Mean service time for cashier station (seconds)
      selfServiceTime - Mean service time for self-service station (seconds)
      coffeeTime - Mean service time for coffee station (seconds)
      variabilityEnabled - Whether to enable service time variability (normal distribution vs fixed)
      selfServiceEnabled - Whether the self-service station is enabled
      coffeeEnabled - Whether the coffee station is enabled
      arrivalRate - Customer arrival rate (students per hour)
      maxQueueCapacity - Maximum queue capacity for service points

  • Method Details

    • initialization

      protected void initialization()
      Initializes the simulation by generating the first customer arrival event. This method is called once at the start of the simulation.
      Specified by:
      initialization in class Engine

    • runEvent

      protected void runEvent(Event t)
      Processes simulation events (B-phase events). Handles all event types including customer arrivals, meal departures, payment completions, and coffee service completions.
      Specified by:
      runEvent in class Engine
      Parameters:
      t - The event to process

    • routeToPayment

      protected int routeToPayment(Customer customer)
      Routes a customer to the appropriate payment station based on their payment type. Customers with self-service preference go to self-service if enabled, otherwise to cashier.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer to route
      Returns:
      The cashier station number (0 = self-service, 1 = cashier1, 2 = cashier2)

    • redirectToCashier

      protected int redirectToCashier(Customer customer)
      Redirects a customer to the least busy cashier station. Chooses between cashier station 1 and 2 based on queue lengths.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer to redirect
      Returns:
      The cashier station number (1 or 2), defaults to 1 if both are full

    • updateDisplays

      protected void updateDisplays()
      Updates all displays during the simulation. Called periodically by the engine to refresh UI elements.
      Overrides:
      updateDisplays in class Engine

    • pause

      public void pause()
      Pauses the simulation by setting the paused flag to true. The simulation will wait at the next checkPaused() call.
      Specified by:
      pause in interface IEngine
      Overrides:
      pause in class Engine

    • resumeSimulation

      public void resumeSimulation()
      Resumes a paused simulation by clearing the paused flag and notifying all waiting threads.
      Specified by:
      resumeSimulation in interface IEngine
      Overrides:
      resumeSimulation in class Engine

    • results

      protected void results()
      Called when the simulation completes. Exports simulation statistics to CSV and displays the end time.
      Specified by:
      results in class Engine
